name: json-web-token
description: JSON Web Token (JWT) is a compact token format intended for space constrained environments such as HTTP Authorization headers and URI query parameters.

scripts.coverage: istanbul cover tape test/test.js && istanbul check-coverage
scripts.bench: echo 'installing dependencies first ...' && sleep 1 && npm i --save-dev benchmark microtime && echo '' && node bench && npm uninstall --save-dev benchmark microtime
